articles.title: ClinCheck Live brings AI planning to Invisalign dental treatments

articles.content: Align Technology, a medical device company that designs, manufactures, and sells the Invisalign system of clear aligners, exocad CAD/CAM software, and iTero intra-oral scanners, has unveiled ClinCheck Live Plan, a new feature in its Invisalign digital dental treatment planning. articles.title: Altman and Nadella need more power for AI, but they’re not sure how much
articles.summary: The CEOs of OpenAI and Microsoft are betting that AI will continue to consume more electricity, but they're not sure how much.  That could leave some investors holding the bag.
articles.content: The CEOs of OpenAI and Microsoft are betting that AI will continue to consume more electricity, but they're not sure how much. That could leave some investors holding the bag.

articles.content: OpenAI is on a spending spree to secure its AI compute supply chain, signing a new deal with AWS as part of its multi-cloud strategy. articles.title: AI browsers are a significant security threat
articles.summary: Among the explosion of AI systems, AI web browsers such as Fellou and Comet from Perplexity have begun to make appearances on the corporate desktop.  Such applications are described as the next evolut.
articles.content: Among the explosion of AI systems, AI web browsers such as Fellou and Comet from Perplexity have begun to make appearances on the corporate desktop. Such applications are described as the next evolution of the humble browser, and come with AI features built in; they can read and summarise web pages
articles.author: AI News

articles.title: OpenAI and Amazon ink $38B cloud computing deal
articles.summary: OpenAI isn't done securing the AI infrastructure it needs to rapidly scale agentic workloads.  The ChatGPT maker on Monday said it has reached a deal with Amazon to buy $38 billion in cloud computing .
articles.content: OpenAI isn't done securing the AI infrastructure it needs to rapidly scale agentic workloads. The ChatGPT maker on Monday said it has reached a deal with Amazon to buy $38 billion in cloud computing services over the next seven years.
articles.author: Rebecca Bellan

articles.title: Microsoft’s $15.2B UAE investment turns Gulf State into test case for US AI diplomacy
articles.summary: For the first time, the U.  has granted Microsoft a license to export Nvidia chips to the UAE — a move that positions the country as both a proving ground for U.
articles.content: For the first time, the U.S. has granted Microsoft a license to export Nvidia chips to the UAE — a move that positions the country as both a proving ground for U.S. export-control diplomacy and a regional anchor of American AI influence.
articles.author: Rebecca Bellan

articles.title: Kevin Rose’s simple test for AI hardware — would you want to punch someone in the face who’s wearing it?
articles.summary: "As an investor, you kind of have to not only say, okay, cool tech, sure, but emotionally, how does it make me feel.  And how does it make others feel around me.
